query:
SELECT
                COALESCE(
                    miniblocks.l1_batch_number,
                    (
                        SELECT
                            (MAX(number) + 1)
                        FROM
                            l1_batches
                    ),
                    (
                        SELECT
                            MAX(l1_batch_number) + 1
                        FROM
                            snapshot_recovery
                    )
                ) as "l1_batch_number!"
            FROM
                miniblocks
            WHERE
                number = $1
